item.title: Introducing Toxiproxy Haskell
item.description: With the release of toxiproxy-haskell on Hackage, I’d like to introduce the Haskell community to failure testing using Toxiproxy so that they can improve the resilience of their network connected applications. Toxiproxy Toxiproxy is a cross platform TCP proxy that lets you simulate latency, timeouts, rejections and other network conditions in your test and development environments. I think the best way to explain how Toxiproxy works is through an example.
